project-desc: BenCham, a politico-economic commerce company, hosted a charity ball to promote water awareness for Thirst. Thirst provides positive, accurate, and content about how to properly handle water. I was the lead designer in charge of the overall branding design and the projectâ€™s branding materials used and presented at the ball including floor banners, stage and photo backdrops, a menu, name tags, invitation cards, posters, and an official event page.
